enchantment.randomenchants2.solar_enchan: Repairs Items When there's light or it's daytime
enchantment.randomenchants2.randomness.d: Gives random blocks/items when a block is broken
enchantment.randomenchants2.magnetic.des: Broken blocks go directly into the player's inventory
80% Chance of repairing the pickaxe when braking Stone Blocks
enchantment.randomenchants2.eternal.desc: Items with the Enchantment won't despawn after being dropped
enchantment.randomenchants2.dungeoneerin: When killing an entity, there's a chance for the entity to drop items from a dungeon loot table
enchantment.randomenchants2.grappling.de: When getting hooked to a block, be prepared to land correctly!
enchantment.randomenchants2.snatching.de: Pull out the armor off of any Mob
enchantment.randomenchants2.teleportatio: Teleports the shooter where the projectile was shot except when there's lava
enchantment.randomenchants2.torches.desc: Illuminate the are with an arrow!
enchantment.randomenchants2.true_shot.de: Accuracy improvement a.k.a no gravity in arrows
enchantment.randomenchants2.equal_mine.d: Blocks above hardness 1 are mine at the same speed
